Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 for x86-64) 2023.1.1 (Build 380_0_22870U)

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

Method.name: UploadFormFile
DeleteFormFile
CreateOrUpdateItemMaster
Method.Description:
Creates a new Item Master with the data from newItemMast

If you pass a ARCItmMast object to the second parameter, this method will update the data on this object and related objects instead of creating a new ItemMast.

Method.name: UpdateARCItmMastPHCDrgFormPack
Method.Implementation: Set tSC = "" Try { &sql( DECLARE ItmMast CURSOR FOR SELECT ARCIM_RowId, ARCIM_Code, ARCIM_Desc, ARCIM_PHCDF_DR, ARCIM_PHCDF_DR->PHCDF_MIMSno, ARCIM_DMDLevel, (SELECT PACK_RowId FROM SQLUser.PHC_DrgFormPack WHERE PACK_MIMSno = ARCIM_PHCDF_DR->PHCDF_MIMSno) "PACKRowId", (SELECT PACK_MIMSno FROM SQLUser.PHC_DrgFormPack WHERE PACK_MIMSno = ARCIM_PHCDF_DR->PHCDF_MIMSno) "PACKMIMSno", ARCIM_DrgFormPack_DR, ARCIM_DrgFormPack_DR->PACK_MIMSno INTO :ARCIMRowId, :ARCIMCode, :ARCIMDesc, :ARCIMPHCDFDR, :PHCDFMIMSno, :ARCIMDMDLevel, :PACKRowIdQ, :PACKMIMSnoQ, :ARCIMDrgFormPackDR, :PACKMIMSno FROM SQLUser.ARC_ItmMast WHERE 1=1 AND (ARCIM_DMDLevel <> 'VMP' OR ARCIM_DMDLevel IS NULL) AND ARCIM_Desc LIKE '%METRONIDAZOL%' ) &sql(OPEN ItmMast) If SQLCODE =0 { &sql(FETCH ItmMast) While (SQLCODE = 0) { Set oARCItmMast = ##class(User.ARCItmMast).%OpenId(ARCIMRowId) Set oPHCDrgFromPack = ##class(User.PHCDrgFormPack).%OpenId(PACKRowIdQ) If debug = 1 { if $ISOBJECT(oARCItmMast) { Write "oARCItmMast.ARCIMRowId: "_oARCItmMast.%Id()_" ",! Write "oARCItmMast.ARCIMCode: "_oARCItmMast.ARCIMCode_" ",! Write "oARCItmMast.ARCIMDesc: "_oARCItmMast.ARCIMDesc_" ",! Write "oARCItmMast.ARCIMPHCDFDR: "_oARCItmMast.ARCIMPHCDFDR.%Id()_" ",! Write "oARCItmMast.PHCDFMIMSno: "_oARCItmMast.ARCIMPHCDFDR.PHCDFMIMSno_" ",! Write "oARCItmMast.ARCIMDMDLevel: "_oARCItmMast.ARCIMDMDLevel_" ",! Write "Query.PACKRowIdQ: "_PACKRowIdQ_" ",! Write "Query.PACKMIMSnoQ: "_PACKMIMSnoQ_" ",! } else { Write "Query.ARCIMRowId: "_ARCIMRowId_" ",! Write "Query.ARCIMCode: "_ARCIMCode_" ",! Write "Query.ARCIMDesc: "_ARCIMDesc_" ",! Write "Query.ARCIMPHCDFDR: "_ARCIMPHCDFDR_" ",! Write "Query.PHCDFMIMSno: "_PHCDFMIMSno_" ",! Write "Query.ARCIMDMDLevel: "_ARCIMDMDLevel_" ",! Write "Query.PACKRowIdQ: "_PACKRowIdQ_" ",! Write "Query.PACKMIMSnoQ: "_PACKMIMSnoQ_" ",! Write "Query.ARCIMDrgFormPackDR: "_ARCIMDrgFormPackDR_" ",! Write "Query.PACKMIMSno: "_PACKMIMSno_" ",! } } Set oARCItmMast.ARCIMDMDLevel = "AMPP" Set oARCItmMast.ARCIMDrgFormPackDR = oPHCDrgFromPack if upload Set tSC = oARCItmMast.%Save() If $$$ISERR(tSC) { Write "--------- ERROR --------", ! Write $SYSTEM.Status.GetErrorText(tSC),! } if debug Write "___________________________________________________________________________",! &sql(FETCH ItmMast) } &sql(CLOSE ItmMast) } Else { Write "SQLCODE: "_SQLCODE,! } } Catch(ex) { Set tSC = "Error("_ex.Code_"): "_ex.Data if debug Write tSC,! } if upload { Set tSC = "Proceso finalizado - Data guardada" } else { Set tSC = "Proceso finalizado - Modo revision sin guardado de data" } Quit tSC
